short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give you the specific unique meaning of a word IN its SPECIFIC UNIQUE Context.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
-Give you the specific unique meaning of a word IN its SPECIFIC UNIQUE Context. Use LLM for translation.
-You won't need a certain directory to look up an unfamiliar english word. The entries in the directory is stiff. The directory extract, summarize the meanings of a certain word across many senario. But none of them fits your specific context. And it saves your time of looking up the entries one by one to find the fit.
-LLM, the master of langage, help you analyse the specific mapped meaning in the word's context. Give you the Ah-ha moment of TRUELY understanding.
-The difference between our extension and other LLM-driven translator: We combine the context of the selected word with the LLM to get the specific meaning, not the general meaning which has nothing to do with your context.
-We also provide the original meaning for better understanding!
-Use AI to boost your English Learning. Choose the MODERN way for learning language.
-This is a Minimal Viable Product. Stay tuned for fancier features coming soon!
-Any comments of advice helping us improve our product. We appreciate your feedback!
